scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file output.yaml --s3-bucket attachable-api-bucket
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yaml --stack-name attachable-api --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.qd: npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:test: aws cloudformation package && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yaml --stack-name attachable-api --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides DestinationLambdaARN=arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:375983427419:function:lambda-create-email-template-a-CreateEmailTemplate-1DH52GPPRKP05 DestinationLambdaRole=lambda-create-email-templa-CreateEmailTemplateRole-1P35K2YMXSKE6
